name: 蔣勇南
objective: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
schedule:
Week　　Topics 
1　　Intro
2　　Personality
3　　Language aptitude (p31~49; 50~63)
4　　Motivation (p65-92; p93-119)
5　　Lamb (2004) Integrative Motivation in a globalizing world
Lo & Hyland (2007) L2 writing motivation (action research)
Pair work: High-Motivation/Low-Anxiety Lesson Writing
6　　McIntyre & Gardner (1989) Anxiety: Theoretical Clarification
Vogely (1998): Listening anxiety 
Pair work: High-Motivation/Low-Anxiety Lesson Writing
7　　Sato: Reading anxiety
Chiang (2012): perfectionism & writing anxiety
Pair work: High-Motivation/Low-Anxiety Lesson Writing
8　　Sparks (2000) & Horwitz (2000) Debate
Group Debate & High-Motivation/Low-Anxiety Lesson Demo
9　　Reflection 1 Due
Mid-term: Student-Teacher Conference on Term Paper Topic
10　　Learning styles and cognitive styles (p.121-161)
11　　Kennedy (2004): Chinese learning styles
Oxford: Style war   
12　　Learning strategies and self-regulated learning (p.162-196)
13　　Chiang (2012): Foreign language learning strategies
Listening, Vocabulary or writing strategies
Pair Work: Strategy Training Activities Writing
14　　Block: reading strategies (native vs native speaker, qualitative)
Pair Work: Strategy Training Activities Writing
15　　Strategy Training Demo 
16　　Term Paper Oral Presentation
Reflection 2 Due
17　　June 12: Dragon Boat Festival
18　　Learning Folder & Term Paper Due on June 17
scorePolicy:
Leading Summary and Discussion    　　　　     　　   　　20%
Participation & Reflections　　　　　　　　　　　　　　20%
Practical Applications                               20%
Term Paper    　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　40%
materials:
a. Dornyei, Z. (2005). The psychology of the language learner: Individual differences in second language acquisition. Mahwah, NJ: Lawrence Erlbaum Associates.
b. Articles from applied linguistics journals.
